CustomField.formula: if(ISPICKVAL( Course_Name__c,''),'',if(OR(ISPICKVAL( Course_Name__c ,'Data Science Course'), ISPICKVAL( Course_Name__c ,'Backend Development Course'), ISPICKVAL( Course_Name__c ,'Fullstack Development Course'), ISPICKVAL( Course_Name__c ,'Frontend Development Course'), ISPICKVAL( Course_Name__c ,'Software Testing Course')), 'Tech','Business'))
CustomField.label: Category
